name: retail-agentic
description: Multi-tenant retail platform with reactive backend and modern frontends

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && mvn clean install && cd ../shared && npm install && cd ../consumer-web && npm install && cd ../admin-web && npm install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:consumer" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build:frontend: npm run build:shared && npm run build:consumer && npm run build:admin
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:shared && npm run test:consumer && npm run test:admin
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:consumer && npm run lint:admin
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check:shared && npm run type-check:consumer && npm run type-check:admin
scripts.clean:frontend: cd shared && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../consumer-web && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../admin-web && rm -rf node_modules dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
